summary:
Game Changer: 2 Fans Die After Attending Ram Charan Film's Pre-Release Event; Dil Raju Offers Rs10-Lakh Aid

Date: January 06, 2025 Source: News18

Two Ram Charan fans tragically lost their lives after attending the film's pre-release event in Rajahmundry. The families will receive financial assistance from the producer Dil Raju.

  • The victims were identified as Arava Manikanta (23) and Thokada Charan (22).
  • They were involved in a fatal accident on their way home after the event.
  • Dil Raju has pledged Rs 10 lakh to support the families affected.
  • Pawan Kalyan also promised Rs 5 lakh each to the victims’ families.
  • This incident follows another tragic event where a woman died at a Pushpa 2 screening.
“I pray that their souls rest in peace, and we will stand by and support the two families.” - Dil Raju

This sorrowful event highlights the dangers associated with large public gatherings and the importance of ensuring safety for all attendees.
newTitle: Tragic Incident at Ram Charan's Film Event Claims Two Lives

title: Paatal Lok Season 2 Trailer OUT: Jaideep Ahlawat's Hathiram Faces New Battles In Nagaland, Watch Here - News18
summary:

Published on: January 06, 2025, 19:05 IST

Prime Video has released the highly anticipated trailer for the second season of its acclaimed neo-noir crime series, Paatal Lok, set to premiere on January 17, 2025. The series will explore deeper themes of crime and human nature, featuring returning and new cast members.

  • Jaideep Ahlawat reprises his role as Inspector Hathi Ram Chaudhary in an eight-episode narrative.
  • The plot delves into an investigation involving the disappearance of a migrant worker tied to a drug syndicate in Nagaland.
  • The new season promises a darker narrative filled with moral dilemmas and personal battles.
  • Returning cast includes Ishwak Singh and Gul Panag, alongside new faces such as Tillotama Shome and Nagesh Kukunoor.
“Hathi Ram Chaudhary wasn’t just a character; it became a mirror reflecting the complexities of society and humanity.” - Jaideep Ahlawat

Paatal Lok Season 2 is expected to challenge viewers with its layered storytelling and emotional depth, reinforcing its status as a leading crime drama.
newTitle: Paatal Lok Season 2 Trailer Released: New Challenges Await Jaideep Ahlawat's Hathi Ram in Nagaland

title: Mumbai gynaecologist Dr Rustom Soonawala, trusted by Bollywood stars, dies at 95 - The Indian Express
summary:
Mumbai Gynaecologist Dr. Rustom Soonawala Passes Away at 95

Publication Date: Not specified | Source: Indian Express

Dr. Rustom Soonawala, a renowned gynaecologist who assisted in the births of celebrity offspring including Kareena and Ranbir Kapoor, has passed away at the age of 95 after a prolonged illness. He was celebrated for his kindness, professionalism, and significant contributions to women's health.

  • Inventor of the polyethylene intra-uterine device in the 1960s.
  • A Padmashree awardee and former professor emeritus at Wadia Maternity Hospital.
  • Highly respected by both patients and staff for his compassionate nature.
  • Mentor to many young doctors and an inspirational figure in the medical field.
“He was gentle not just with patients but everyone.” - Dr. Duru Shah

Dr. Soonawala's legacy continues with the impact he had on the lives of countless mothers and healthcare professionals, and his teachings remain relevant today.
newTitle: Mumbai Gynaecologist Dr. Rustom Soonawala Passes Away at 95

title: Pushpa 2 box office report: Allu Arjun's film dethrones Prabhas' Baahubali 2; becomes highest-grossing film in India - Hindustan Times

Date: January 06, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

Pushpa 2 has officially dethroned Baahubali 2 to become the highest-grossing film in India, crossing ₹1438 crore in just 32 days since its release.

  • Pushpa 2 grossed ₹1831 crore worldwide.
  • It surpassed the previous record held by Baahubali 2 for over 8 years.
  • Pushpa 2: The Rule was released on December 5, 2024.
  • It is a sequel to the successful 2021 film, Pushpa: The Rise.
  • Pushpa 3 has been announced but no shooting plans are currently in place.
“#Pushpa2TheRule is now Indian Cinema's INDUSTRY HIT with THE HIGHEST EVER COLLECTION FOR A MOVIE IN INDIA,” the team announced.

The success of Pushpa 2 highlights the growing dominance of Indian cinema on a global scale.

title: Hyderabad police urges Allu Arjun to keep hospital visit confidential - Deccan Chronicle
summary:
Hyderabad Police Requests Allu Arjun to Keep Hospital Visit Confidential

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Not specified

Hyderabad police have urged film actor Allu Arjun to keep his visit to KIMS hospital confidential to maintain public order while visiting nine-year-old Sritej, who is undergoing treatment after a tragic incident.

  • Police requested Allu Arjun to ensure confidentiality during his hospital visit.
  • Inspector T Narsing Rao stated that arrangements were made for the actor’s visit at 10:30 am on Sunday.
  • Allu Arjun's visit was planned following an earlier agreement to maintain public order.
  • The actor’s visit was ultimately canceled at the last minute by his manager.
  • Sritej is being treated after suffering severe injuries in a theater stampede, which also claimed his mother’s life.
“We request you to keep the visit a confidential one, so that public order can be maintained in and around the hospital,” - Inspector T Narsing Rao.

The police emphasized their readiness to facilitate the actor’s visit swiftly and securely, highlighting the concern for public safety and the well-being of the young patient.

title: WWE Raw debut on Netflix: Why are Indian fans missing out on Monday night premiere event on OTT? - Mint
summary:
WWE Raw Debuts on Netflix: Indian Fans Excluded from Premiere Event

Publication Date: January 6
Source: Live Mint

The World Wrestling Entertainment (WWE) is making its Monday night debut on Netflix, a first in its history, while Indian fans will continue to watch the event on television instead of the OTT platform.

WWE aims to attract a larger audience with renowned legends set to appear, including The Rock and Hulk Hogan, alongside John Cena on his farewell tour.

  1. WWE's Monday Night Raw premieres on Netflix on January 6.
  2. Key matches include Seth Rollins vs CM Punk and Roman Reigns vs Solo Sikoa.
  3. Indian fans can view the event on Sony Sports channels on January 7 at 6:30 AM IST.
  4. Current WWE broadcasting rights in India remain with Sony Sports until March 31.
"Indian fans can watch WWE Monday Night Raw on Sony Sports channels on January 7 from 6:30 AM IST."

Despite the excitement surrounding WWE's Netflix debut, Indian fans face a delay in accessing the content, raising questions about the future of WWE streaming in India.
newTitle: WWE Raw Debuts on Netflix: Indian Fans Excluded from Premiere Event

title: 'Pushpa 2' worldwide box office collection day 32: The Allu Arjun starrer stands at Rs 1770 crores, on it - TOI Etimes
summary:
'Pushpa 2' worldwide box office collection day 32: The Allu Arjun starrer stands at Rs 1770 crores, on its way to beat 'Baahubali 2' and 'Dangal'

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Times of India

'Pushpa 2' has surpassed significant box office milestones, grossing Rs 1770 crores worldwide and positioning itself to challenge records set by other major films.

  • 'Pushpa 2' is now the highest-grossing Indian film at the domestic box office.
  • It currently ranks third for worldwide gross, behind 'Dangal' (Rs 2070 crore) and 'Baahubali 2' (Rs 1790 crore).
  • The film’s collection in India is Rs 1200 crore, eclipsing the Rs 1030 crore of 'Baahubali 2'.
  • The Hindi version of the film outperformed the Telugu version domestically, a notable achievement.
“One never knows!” - potential of exceeding 'Dangal' remains in speculation.

'Pushpa 2' has entered historical territory for Indian cinema, especially in the post-pandemic landscape, as no other Indian movie has come so close to these records in recent times.
newTitle: 'Pushpa 2' Box Office Milestone: Grosses Rs 1770 Crores and Aims for 'Baahubali 2' Record
